snippet.title: Classic Invaders - Amstrad CPC Gameplay
snippet.description:
This was Bubble Bus Software's attempt at a Space Inaders clone. As Space Invaders clones go, this is an impressive effort, from the software house that brought us Wizard's Lair and Starquake.
It is very quick indeed, and has a particularly nice explosion when an Invader is struck.

Classic Invaders (C) Bubble Bus Software
